se.cbb.jprime.mcmc

Interface Proposer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    InfoProvider
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NormalProposer, RBTreeBranchSwapper

    public interface Proposer
extends InfoProvider
    Interface for objects perturbing the values of one or more StateParameter objects, e.g. MCMC parameters. This is closely connected to what is sometimes referred to as operators or kernels in an MCMC context.

    Each Proposer is also associated with:

    • a ProposerStatistics which keeps track of how the often proposed states have been accepted or rejected (possibly including more detailed info).
    • a set of TuningParameter objects (possibly none), which typically governs the "reach" of a suggested state change. These parameters may also change over time.
    Generally, for optimisation reasons, the Proposer is responsible for caching and restoring the state parameter values rather than the parameters themselves. This is because the Proposer perhaps only alters but a small part of the values.

    A Proposer may be turned off/on with method setEnabled(...).

    Author:
    Joel Sj√∂strand.

    • Method Detail

      • getParameters

        java.util.Set<StateParameter> getParameters()
        Returns all parameters which can be perturbed by this object. It is not required that all these are always perturbed simultaneously, nor is it prohibited.
        Returns:
        the parameters.

      • getNoOfParameters

        int getNoOfParameters()
        Returns the number of parameters.
        Returns:
        the number of parameters.

      • getNoOfSubParameters

        int getNoOfSubParameters()
        Returns the total number of sub-parameters contained within the parameters perturbed by this object. If a scalar parameter, 1 should be returned.
        Returns:
        the total number of sub-parameters.

      • setStatistics

        void setStatistics(ProposerStatistics stats)
        Sets the proposal statistics of this object.
        Parameters:
        stats - the statistics.

      • getStatistics

        ProposerStatistics getStatistics()
        Returns the proposal statistics of this object.
        Returns:
        the statistics.

      • getTuningParameters

        java.util.List<TuningParameter> getTuningParameters()
        Returns all tuning parameters for this object. May return null.
        Returns:
        the tuning parameters.

      • isEnabled

        boolean isEnabled()
        Returns whether this proposer is active or not.
        Returns:
        true if enabled; false if disabled.

      • setEnabled

        void setEnabled(boolean isActive)
        Controls whether this proposer is active or not.
        Parameters:
        isActive - true to enable; false to disable.

      • cacheAndPerturb

        Proposal cacheAndPerturb(java.util.Map<Dependent,ChangeInfo> changeInfos)
        Executes an actual perturbation of state parameter(s). Behaviour must adhere to the following: Change info is set for each perturbed parameter, and set to null for each non-perturbed parameter which this Proposer acts on.
        Returns:
        an object detailing the proposal.

      • clearCache

        void clearCache()
        Clears the cached (previous) state of perturbed parameters when a proposed state has been accepted.

      • restoreCache

        void restoreCache()
        Restores the cached (previous) state of perturbed parameters when a proposed state has been rejected.
